Articles.Content: I am quite wondering why all parts are immoral for atmospheric burn.. I think it would be great when items would have temparature limit and if all of that would work. It is crazy to see some breakable parts or very non aerodynamic designs surviving burn and that things are not aerodynamicly affected. I know it makes game much more easy especialy for beginners but I would love to see some more real physics.
While we appreciate the concern, atmospheric reentry is something that has been mentioned multiple times and is, consequently, on the what not to suggest list. I'm going to close this.
